ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2016-11-28
          -Approval Carried the proposal of Rep. Macapagal-Arroyo to insert provision prohibiting the BSP from supervising operations of AMLA.
          -1st meeting. Approved per Sec. 48 of the Rules of the House, in consolidation with HBs 731, 3456 and 4283.
      2. Committee Report approved on 2017-11-22
          -Approved draft substitute bill containing amendments introduced by Appropriations and Ways & Means committees
      3. Recommended recommitment to the committee of referral on 2018-03-18
          -Substitute bill HB 7296 under CR 637 recommitted to mother committee.
      4. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-03-20
          -Approved amendment to substitute bill HB 7296 under CR 637 as per recommendation of the Committee on Rules.
      5. Committee Report filed on 2018-05-21
          -Committee Report 741 Substitute Bill 7742
MOTHER BILL: HB07296
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
